scripts.test: CI=true VITEST_SEGFAULT_RETRY=3 yarn workspaces foreach --parallel run test
scripts.build: run build:clean && run build:ts && yarn workspace next-contentlayer run prepack
scripts.examples:postinstall: yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --include "examples-*" exec yarn contentlayer postinstall
scripts.release:prerelease: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological-dev --parallel --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish --tag=dev
scripts.release:patch: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological-dev --parallel --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && yarn workspaces foreach --verbose --topological-dev --parallel --no-private npm publish --tolerate-republish
